header.subscriber_confirmation: Thank you for subscribing! We will contact you shortly.

background-information.subheader: Growing up in the UAE, Singapore, Bangladesh, Bahrain, and finally settling in Los Angeles, CA I was very fortunate to live a very global life. One thing that was always constant, however, was my love for learning and my passion for collaboration.
background-information.subsubheader: After my years at UCLA I spent a few months working at Darktrace, a cybersecurity company, before making my way back to Singapore to serve as a weapons technician in Singapore Armed Forces. My hope is to be back in the US pursuing a career in product development and software development in 2022. My areas of interest include Machine Learning, Data Mining, and Technology Management.

itemInformation.education: I graduated from UCLA with a double major in Computer Science and Economics in the summer of 2019. As a proud Bruin I don't need much to start an 8 clap.
itemInformation.powerlifting: I started powerlifting in 2016 and even through a few injuries and surgeries I have learned an unbelievable amount about what I can achieve with an unbeatable work ethic and consistent execution.
itemInformation.armylife: A Corporal in the SAF, I am trained to maintain weapons as small as a Sig Sauer P226 and as big as an FH2000 Howitzer. Life in the military has taught me invaluable lessons in team work and perseverance.
itemInformation.photography: Photography is a creative outlet I've been able to nurture since 2011. Check out my work on Flickr to see how I capture the world through a lens!
itemInformation.investing: I started investing in stocks in 2020 but armed with my background in Finance along with work in data analytics and machine learning I hope to build my portfolio into something sizeable!
itemInformation.cooking: Starting off as a novice who cooked for survival at UCLA, inspired by Youtube and a chef-level cook for a mother I have started to bake and cook recipes that make my Instagram followers salivate.
